description: The INVOICE_TX table contains information about the transactions that appear on the invoice.

columns.name: INVOICE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the invoice record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the payment classification line. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: APC_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the transaction record in the payment classification items.

columns.name: ETR_LINE
columns.description: The line number in the transaction record for the bill history group to which this invoice applies.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The ID of the transaction record that appears on the invoice.
